name: Layer 222: The Slime Pits (Shedaklah)
guidance: Portray Shedaklah as a bubbling morass of ooze and fungus ruled by Juiblex and Zuggtmoy.
Use caustic slimes, toxic vapors, and colossal fungal palaces to define the terrain.
Highlight the uneasy coexistence of two demon lords with overlapping dominions.
